title: NEW CHAMPIONS SKILL SET
body:
Passive- a bowl o' rice-  every 10/9/8/7 seconds, Tamm's next attack inflicts the enemy with ebola, doing 10/20/30/40 (+20 ap) each second until they die.

Q- stop the boats- summons Tony Abbott, whick stays there for 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 seconds and stops all projectiles from coming near him, inflicts nearby enemies with ebola.

W- Shrek's blessing- snares target champion for 1 second, if it is an ally then it heals for 40/60/90/120/150 (+50%) ap) If it is an enemy than it inflicts ebola on them

E- Friendship is magic- summons either rainbow dash, twilight sparkle or fluttershy, which then run across the screen illuminating the colours and spredding rainbows

R- Grand finale- you start a surrender vote where only you participate in, you can vote 5 times.


So what do you think of the new champion, Tamm, I personally think he's be bast as support because he can block all projectiles with his Q and can heal the ADC a lot.
